name: A night on Earth
description:
You're an exploration drone pilot, one of the best.

That's why you're tasked with saving a brand new unit, the SEEED mk.V, through using manual commands and rebuilding it's ship. We don't know much about the planet SEEED has landed on, so keep your eyes open !

Note : Loading at launch can be a bit long. Don't worry, the game is running correctly.
